You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesQ Q] > &qopf;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Qopf;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/211a/index.htm U+0211A].
  * `&qopf;` maps to the Unicode character U+1D562.
